attributes.description:
The clean lines and compact frame of the Lenovo IdeaCentre AIO 3 encases a singularly performance-driven machine, with AMD Athlon Silver Processor for raw power and ultra-fast performance. And the tiny desk footprint of this quintessential family PC belies its entertainment features, with a wide three-narrow-bezel FHD display and powerful Harman-certified stereo speakers.

Model number: F0FX009SUK.

Part number: F0FX009SUK.

We have included, for your peace of mind, 2 Years of our Lenovo Premium Care service with our dedicated products. Premium Care is front-of-the-queue and straight-to-the-experts customer support service from Lenovo that provides you peace of mind and faster solutions, allowing you to get the best from your new device. That means fast resolutions, whatever the issue, on your first contact. If needed, our team will schedule an onsite visit for the next business day.

The IdeaCentre AIO 3 also improves on its previous generation with two USB 2.0 ports, two USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A ports, effectively bumping up max data transfer speeds to 10GB per second. Other connectivity options include one 1000 LAN, one microphone/earphone combo, one Power DC Jack and one HDMI-Out. View more of the screen with the IdeaCentre AIO 3's three-sided narrow bezel FHD display for vibrant colours that surface on screen with crystal-clear quality from almost any angle.

CPU and Memory:

  • AMD Athlon - Silver 3050U processor.
  • Dual core processor.
  • Processor speed 2.3GHz with a burst speed of 3.2GHz.
  • 4 GB RAM DDR4.

Hard drive:

  • 256GB SSD storage.

Graphics:

  • Shared graphics.
  • AMD Radeon .

Interfaces and connectivity:

  • 2 x USB 2.0 ports.
  • 2 x USB 3.2 ports.
  • Ethernet port.
  • 1 HDMI port.
  • Headphones jack.
  • Bluetooth.
  • Wireless/Wi-Fi enabled.

Webcam and sound:

  • HD webcam.
  • Speaker power 2 x 3 watts RMS.
  • Wireless keyboard and mouse.

Operating system and software:

  • Windows 11 Home.

Monitor:

  • 24in display.
  • Resolution 1920 x 1080 pixels.
  • Full HD Display.

General features:

  • Size H43.35, W54.1, D18.53cm.
  • Weight 6.81kg.
  • Manufacturer's 2 year guarantee.
  • EAN: 196803799590.

attributes.shortDescription: Buy selected laptop and Save £25 on M365 Personal and Family
attributes.longDescription: Save £25 on Microsoft 365 Personal 1 Year,1 User and Microsoft 365 Family 1 Year, 6 Users when purchase with selected laptops.

attributes.title: Memory
attributes.content: Can I buy something to add more memory to store games

answers.content: Hi, thank you for the question. The Lenovo IdeaCentre3 has two DDR4 SO-DIMM slots, dual-channel capable that can go up to 16GB DDR4-2400. The IdeaCentre3 also has up to two drives, 1x 2.5" HDD + 1x M.2 SSD that can be expanded to 2.5" HDD up to 1TB & M.2 SSD up to 512GB. I hope this information helped. Rovaldo - Lenovo.

attributes.title: What is the refresh rate and response time of this monitor?

answers.content: Hi Josh, thank you for the question. The Lenovo IdeaCentre3 has a 60hz refresh rate display. I hope this information helped. Rovaldo - Lenovo.

Hi Josh, thank you for the question. The IdeaCentre 3 comes with an AMD Athlon™ Silver 3050U processor, this offer speeds that are a lot higher than the minimum requirements for both games. Happy gaming! Rovaldo - Lenovo.

attributes.title: Can you play sims on this

answers.content: Hi, Thank you for your question in regards to your below query on the possibility of supporting a game. This product features an AMD Athlon processor, 4BG RAM and 256 SSD storage. These make the laptop capable of running apps and games such as The Sims 4. I hope that this is of help, thanks for your message and interest. Best Wishes, James - Lenovo.

attributes.title: Is the hdmi input or output?

answers.content:
Hi Guy, thank you for your question in regards to the Lenovo IdeaCentre3 All-In-One PC. This product's HDMI port is for output.
I hope that this is of help, thanks for your message and interest. Best Wishes, James - Lenovo.

attributes.title: All in one computer
attributes.content: Can I connect to internet thought wireless without using a internet lead

answers.content: Hi, thank you for the question. The Lenovo IdeaCentre3 has Wireless Wi-Fi connection enabled. I hope this inofrmation helped. Rovlado - Lenovo.

attributes.title: Gaming and Microsoft 365?
attributes.content: How is this for gaming in general like Steam or Minecraft and Microsoft 365? I need a computer that will support both needs while being budget friendly and this has an AMD athlon and graphics so could you please look into this? Thanks.

answers.content: Hi there, thank you for your interest in the Lenovo IdeaCentre3 PC. I can confirm that this PC will be able to comfortably run applications like Minecraft and Microsoft 365. In regards to Steam, this would be dependent on the specific game you wish to run through Steam. I can advise that the system requirements of each game are provided in the product details directly on Steam. Hope this helps. Junaid - Lenovo.

attributes.title: can you attach a printer or do you have to do it wireless

answers.content: Hi Bob, thanks for your question. You can connect a wired printer to this PC as it does have 2 x USB 2.0 ports and 2 x USB 3.2 ports. Hope this helps. Junaid - Lenovo.

attributes.title: Hi. I just need a desktop for simple office work. Will this do it. Its not for gaming.

answers.content:
Hello Mike, 

I can advise the following for the Lenovo IdeaCentre3 23.8in AMD Athlon 4GB 256GB All-in-One PC: 

While this will work for simple single application work, if you require more than one application open at a time for multitasking then looking for a computer with more RAM (8gb or greater) will be best. 

Thanks for using Q&A.

attributes.title: Can you add a dvd drive to the computer?

answers.content:
Hello Katie,

This type of PC does not have the capability to have an inbuilt disc drive added however you can use a portable, plug in disc drive.

I hope this helps
Thanks for using Q&A

attributes.title: Excellent product.
attributes.text: Very pleased with my new Lenovo. Bought it to replace my previous Lenovo, which gave me sterling service for the last 10 years

productReviewed.name: Lenovo IdeaCentre3 23.8in AMD Athlon 4GB 256GB All-in-One PC

attributes.title: Dont buy .. poor quality .  Doesnt work
attributes.text: The system sent was not booting up, keyboard not working. Pathetic delivery

productReviewed.name: Lenovo IdeaCentre3 23.8in AMD Athlon 4GB 256GB All-in-One PC

attributes.title: An excellent product
attributes.text: An excellent product. The all-in-one concept provided a powerful desktop computer without all the clutter of the usual pc. So nice to be free of numerous cables and the computer tower. The screen is bright and clear, the keyboard and mouse are light and responsive and the computer has more than adequate speed and storage.

productReviewed.name: Lenovo IdeaCentre3 23.8in AMD Athlon 4GB 256GB All-in-One PC

attributes.title: be careful
attributes.text:
Easy bit was buying it,. Got it up and running GREAT. Then 1 month left on warranty its telling me, After speaking and emailing Lenovo emailed receipt and got warranty updated 12months? eh 24 months i said no we only give 12, the other is with Argos!!  So contacted Argos rang and emailed they said no its with Lenovo, went back and forth several times kept getting the same answer from both of them saying its them!!
Ridiculous never going to use them for this type of product again.

productReviewed.name: Lenovo IdeaCentre3 23.8in AMD Athlon 4GB 256GB All-in-One PC

clientResponses.Response: Hi there, thank you for taking the time to leave us a review and I am sorry to hear about your experience regarding your recent purchase. I will be sure to pass on your valued feedback to our team. I do apologise for any disappointment caused and if you have any questions, please don't hesitate to contact us again. Chris - Lenovo.

attributes.title: Great budget pc
attributes.text: Bought for my partner and it’s a great budget pc. It is a bit slow but has lots of great features and doesn’t take up too much room. We like the wireless keyboard and mouse and the built in webcam.

productReviewed.name: Lenovo IdeaCentre3 23.8in AMD Athlon 4GB 256GB All-in-One PC

attributes.title: Great colour and so fast after my old one.
attributes.text: I bought this a month and it was easy to collect and pick up and was really well packaged. I was initially surprised that there were so few set instructions in the box but I realised once I got things plugged in just how easy it all was to do. Within 10 mins I was connected to the internet and finding out about all the new features and graphics in the computer. My old one took 15 mins to just boot up where as now a simple press of the button and I’m ready to go. Very impressed with images and speed of use. Perfect for home use. Very happy with purchase.

productReviewed.name: Lenovo IdeaCentre3 23.8in AMD Athlon 4GB 256GB All-in-One PC

attributes.title: Very simple to setup
attributes.text: I bought this as my old pc gave up on me, and I have no issues with this.

productReviewed.name: Lenovo IdeaCentre3 23.8in AMD Athlon 4GB 256GB All-in-One PC

attributes.title: Brill
attributes.text: It so easy to use and ideal size
